title: Postcart Shop
description: React & Material UI-based e-commerce shop for a potential business idea. Also leverages commerce.js and Stripe.

title: Star Wars Trivia
description: Single page app trivia game built on React and Node using the Star Wars API.

title: Evening's Kingdom
description: React & MUI-based site for Paula Schmidt's fantasy series, Evening's Kingdom. By working with the author, we are adding marketing automation tools and analytics in the next update.

title: Chat App
description: Chat app built on Node.js with socket.io as the corresponding chat API.

title: Weather App
description: Pulls weather data based on user-input location from Weatherstack API.

title: Battle Maps
description: Learn more about the most influential battles in history using the Google Maps and Wikipedia APIs.
